## StandardTechnique interface

Technique used to render a mesh geometry. For technique parameters see \[\[StandardTechniqueParams\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StandardTechnique extends MakeTechniqueAttrs<StandardTechniqueParams> 
```
